actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: Relating to the tariff treatment of certain springs and leaves for springs of iron or steel.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on leaf springs and leaves for motor vehicles of 0 to 33,000 lbs. GVW. Excludes such items imported from Mexico from duty-free treatment.

titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of certain springs and leaves for springs of iron or steel.
